name: Running Shoes
description: The Nike Epic React Flyknit foam cushioning is responsive yet lightweight, durable yet soft. This creates a sensation that not only enhances the feeling of moving forward, but makes running feel fun, too.

name: Leather Jacket
description: Crafted from genuine leather, this jacket offers a timeless style with a sleek and modern look. Perfect for both casual and formal wear, it is designed to offer comfort and durability.

name: Smartphone X12
description: Featuring a 6.5-inch OLED display and a powerful A15 Bionic chip, the Smartphone X12 provides an exceptional mobile experience with enhanced performance, camera quality, and battery life.

name: Slim Fit Jeans
description: These slim fit jeans are made from premium denim, providing both comfort and a flattering fit. They are designed to be versatile, pairing perfectly with a range of outfits.

name: Gaming Laptop GX90
description: Equipped with a 10th Gen Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and an NVIDIA RTX 3070 GPU, the GX90 delivers top-tier gaming performance. With a 144Hz display, you can enjoy a smooth, immersive gaming experience.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: These wireless earbuds offer high-quality sound with noise cancellation and a long-lasting battery. Compatible with all major mobile devices, they provide an immersive audio experience on the go.
